short: A book is a bound collection of pages, usually made of paper, parchment, or other materials, with text, images, or both, often enclosed within covers. Books can contain various forms of information, including stories, poetry, non-fiction, academic content, and more. They serve as a medium for conveying knowledge, ideas, stories, and entertainment. Books can come in different formats such as hardcover, paperback, electronic (e-books), and audiobooks. They play a crucial role in education, entertainment, and cultural preservation.

Books can come in different formats such as hardcover, paperback, electronic (e-books), and audiobooks. They play a crucial role in education, entertainment, and cultural preservation.
